tools.name: generate_documentation_from_code
tools.description: Generates documentation from specified code files using an AI model and saves them to corresponding paths.

parameters.name: projectRoot
parameters.description: The absolute root directory of the project. If not provided, it's derived from the session.

parameters.name: documentationMap
parameters.description: A map where keys are source code file paths (relative to projectRoot) and values are output documentation file paths (relative to projectRoot).

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Whether to overwrite existing documentation files.
